data.text: I wish that my head was like [MET] a spring of water,
I wish that I could leave my people and forget them,
Yahweh replied to me,
Do not trust your neighbors and even your brothers!
They deceive their friends
They habitually lie and deceive each other,
Therefore I, the Commander of the armies of angels, say this:
What they say [MTY] injures people like [MET] poisoned arrows do.
Should I not punish them for doing that [RHQ]?
So, I will weep and wail for the people who live in the mountains and in the ◄pastures/places where the livestock eat the grass►,
Yahweh also says, “I will cause Jerusalem to become a heap of ruins,
I said, “Only people who are very wise [RHQ] can understand these things.
Yahweh replied, “These things will happen because my people have rejected my laws which I gave to them;
Instead, they have stubbornly done the things that they wanted to do.
So now listen to what I, the Commander of the armies of angels, the God of the Israelis, say:
I will scatter them to many nations which neither they nor their ancestors have known anything about;
This is also what the Commander of the armies of angels says:
Tell them to come quickly and start to wail,
Listen to the people of Jerusalem crying/lamenting, saying,
You women, listen to what Yahweh says [MTY].
because people will be dying [PRS] in your houses and in palaces.
There will be corpses scattered across the fields like dung;
Yahweh says this:
Instead, those who want to boast should boast about their knowing me
There will be a time when I will punish all those people of Egypt and of the Moab people-group and of the Edom people-group and of the Ammon people-group,
